member.name: T:Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.UserSecretsConfigBuilder
member.summary: A ConfigurationProvider that retrieves values from a local secrets file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.UserSecretsConfigBuilder.UserSecretsId
member.summary: Gets or sets an identifier string used to compose an out-of-solution path to a file that contains secrets. (Set to ${UserSecretsId} to reference the similarly named project property in Visual Studio environments.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.UserSecretsConfigBuilder.UserSecretsFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a path to the secrets file to be used.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.UserSecretsConfigBuilder.LazyInitialize(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.param: The friendly name of the provider.
A collection of the name/value pairs representing builder-specific attributes specified in the configuration for this provider.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.UserSecretsConfigBuilder.GetAllValues(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves all known key/value pairs from the secrets file where the key begins with with .
member.param: A prefix string to filter the list of potential keys retrieved from the source.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.UserSecretsConfigBuilder.GetValue(System.String)
member.summary: Looks up a single 'value' for the given 'key.'
member.param: The 'key' to look up in the secrets file. (Prefix handling is not needed here.)
member.returns: The value corresponding to the given 'key' or null if no value is found.
